description: A Kotlin source file defining the composable UI for a login screen in an Android app using Jetpack Compose. It includes state management, UI layout, and interactions for email and password input, login button, and status messages.

methods.name: LoginScreen
methods.description: Composable function that displays the login screen and manages its state by observing the ViewModel.

methods.name: LoginScreenContent
methods.description: Private composable that renders the main login form UI, handling user inputs and actions.

methods.name: StatusArea
methods.description: Displays current login status, such as loading indicator, success message, or error message.
